name: Random Game
description:
Using the left and right arrows and space bars, move forwards and backwards and jump to reach your goal, this is the most random and boring game you will ever see in your entire life. You will just collect coins and get to the end, but watch out for holes, you only have three lives, but don't worry you may find hearts and collect them.

This game originated from a procrastinator's mind, they had no creativity and made the game as boring as it could be. They tried to make this game as hard as they could, so good luck trying to live. WARNING: This game can't cure boredom, the game causes it.
